user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (feedback@medtechsolutions.com) with her thoughts on the patient profile management system, and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Feedback on the Patient-Profile Management System

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please share your latest thoughts on the patient-profile management system? We’d appreciate it if you could send your feedback directly to feedback@medtechsolutions.com.

Feel free to review any notes or materials you have in your Gmail and Notion workspaces beforehand—they may be helpful as you compile your insights.

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
MedTech Solutions

final_output:
